尚いっそう: (なおいっそう) - further; farther; furthermore; all the more; even more
尚かつ: (なおかつ) - besides/furthermore/on top of that; and yet/nevertheless/even so
尚さら: (なおさら) - all the more; still less

尭尭: (ぎょうぎょう) - high (as of a mountain)

就き: (つき) - concerning; per; on account of
就きましては: (つきましては) - in line with this; therefore
就く: (つく) - to ascend (the throne)/to accede; (就く only) to take (seat, position, course, etc.)/to assume; (就く only) to start (on a journey)/to commence/to depart; (就く only) to study (under teacher)/to be an apprentice
就ける: (つける) - to install (a king, emperor, etc.); (就ける only) to appoint (to a post)/to promote; (就ける only) to assign (to study under)
